metadata.title: CVE-2020-26145 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered on Samsung Galaxy S3 i9305 4.4.4 devices. The WEP,WPA, WPA2, and WPA3 implementations accept second (or subsequent) broadcastfragments even when sent in plaintext and process them as full unfragmentedframes. An adversary can abuse this to inject arbitrary network packetsindependent of the network configuration.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
